summary: 98 CHEV VENTURE WITH 60K BLOWN ENG.DUE TO DEFECTIVE INTAKE GASKET  WHICH GM WONT RECALL.100K ANTIFREEZE SLUDGED AT 30K.OVER 70,000  INTAKE GASKET BACKOREDERED AT ONE TIME.NOV OF2002 MODELS    HAVE UPDATED IMPROVED GASKET WHY SHOULD PUBLIC THAT KEPT UP  ON THIER MAINT HAVE TO PAY FOR DESIGN FLAW.100S OF WEB SITES ON   THIS ISSUE EXSIST.
